item.description:
I'll supply the Beading & Beers, you bring the bitching! :)

I have a long-standing project I will never finish without help. So if you enjoy beading and or sewing come on over and enjoy some fine beers and bitch while beading!

Those who attend and are gracious enough to help me finish my beading project will recieve a beaded gift as my thank you!

This should be a fun, creative time!

Come at 7:00 or later if your schedule does not allow. We can order pizza or I'll have muchies on hand. Just bring you and your creative selves.

If you'd like to know what the project is, just send an email.
item.how_to_find_us: Address will be provided week of
item.name: Girl's Night - Beading, Beer & Bitching
